summary: Order management dashboard with tabs for Total Orders, Ready Orders, Hallmark Orders, Customer Orders, and Karigars. Features karigar filtering, order status tracking, master Excel data mapping for design codes/karigar names/generic names, and export functionality (JPEG/PDF).
architectural_notes: Dashboard includes tabs: Total Orders, Ready Orders, Hallmark Orders, Customer Orders, and Karigars
Master Excel file contains karigar names, generic names, and design codes for mapping
Karigar filtering functionality with dropdown (All Karigars or specific karigar)
Export functionality supporting JPEG and PDF formats
known_issues: Status column missing from Total Orders, Ready, and Hallmark tabs
Ready tab showing all orders instead of filtering by 'Ready' status
Master Excel data not mapping correctly to orders (design codes, karigar names, generic names)
Karigar filter button displays UI glitch when changing selection
Export to JPEG/PDF not working on mobile devices
